name: ErrorCodeAttribute_getReasonPhraseTest
description: Unit tests for the getReasonPhrase method of the ErrorCodeAttribute class.

test_cases.name: testGetReasonPhraseWithSetReasonPhrase
test_cases.description: Tests that the getReasonPhrase method returns the correct reason phrase after it has been set.

test_cases.name: testGetReasonPhraseWithNullReasonPhrase
test_cases.description: Tests that the getReasonPhrase method returns null when no reason phrase has been set.
